unnormalised: Okay, so IPL fever is officially hitting India hard this year, guys! Everyone's talking about it, from the chai wala at the corner to your office colleagues. It's impossible to escape, and honestly, why would you want to?
normalised: Okay, so I-P-L fever is officially hitting India hard this year, guys! Everyone's talking about it, from the chai wala at the corner to your office colleagues. It's impossible to escape, and honestly, why would you want to?

unnormalised: The schedule is jam-packed! The opening ceremony was on 31/03/2024, and it was a blast, even if I only caught snippets on TV while battling Mumbai traffic. They really went all out with the performances this time around, no?
normalised: The schedule is jam-packed! The opening ceremony was on thirty first March two thousand and twenty four, and it was a blast, even if I only caught snippets on T-V while battling Mumbai traffic. They really went all out with the performances this time around, no?

unnormalised: The matches are happening all over India. Some in the blistering heat of Chennai at 4:00 PM IST, some under the cooler Delhi night skies. I’m keeping an eye on the Kolkata Knight Riders’ matches at Eden Gardens; those are always electric! First match there is scheduled on 14/04/2024.
normalised: The matches are happening all over India. Some in the blistering heat of Chennai at four P-M I-S-T, some under the cooler Delhi night skies. I’m keeping an eye on the Kolkata Knight Riders’ matches at Eden Gardens; those are always electric! First match there is scheduled on fourteenth April two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: My personal calendar is now a complex map of matches and commitments. Trying to juggle work, family obligations, and…well, trying to watch every single match! Let's see how long this enthusiasm will last, ha!
normalised: My personal calendar is now a complex map of matches and commitments. Trying to juggle work, family obligations, and…well, trying to watch every single match! Let's see how long this enthusiasm will last, ha!

unnormalised: Of course, figuring out the time zones is a bit of a headache if you're following international players. We've got guys coming from Australia, South Africa, England... It's a global affair! Makes you wonder how they adjust so quickly.
normalised: Of course, figuring out the time zones is a bit of a headache if you're following international players. We've got guys coming from Australia, South Africa, England... It's a global affair! Makes you wonder how they adjust so quickly.

unnormalised: One game I’m definitely preponing things for is the final match. Last year it was an absolute thriller. Everyone was on the edge of their seats! This year, the final is on 26/05/2024. I will be glued to my screen at 7:30 PM sharp, no matter what!
normalised: One game I’m definitely preponing things for is the final match. Last year it was an absolute thriller. Everyone was on the edge of their seats! This year, the final is on twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty four. I will be glued to my screen at seven thirty P-M sharp, no matter what!

unnormalised: Online, you can find match timings in either 12-hour or 24-hour format, depending on the sports site. I personally prefer the 24-hour format to avoid any confusion about AM and PM during those late-night nail-biters!
normalised: Online, you can find match timings in either twelve-hour or twenty-four-hour format, depending on the sports site. I personally prefer the twenty-four-hour format to avoid any confusion about A-M and P-M during those late-night nail-biters!

unnormalised: And the commentary! It seems like there are analyses and post-match discussions scheduled from 10:00 AM to like, 2:00 AM every day! The sheer volume of content is overwhelming, but also incredibly entertaining. They dissect every single ball and strategy.
normalised: And the commentary! It seems like there are analyses and post-match discussions scheduled from ten A-M to like, two A-M every day! The sheer volume of content is overwhelming, but also incredibly entertaining. They dissect every single ball and strategy.

unnormalised: Don't even get me started on the pre-game shows... they start like 2 hrs before the match! It feels like the entire day revolves around cricket during IPL season. No complaints here though!
normalised: Don't even get me started on the pre-game shows... they start like two hours before the match! It feels like the entire day revolves around cricket during I-P-L season. No complaints here though!

unnormalised: So, are you ready for another season of cricket madness? Get those snacks stocked, calendars marked, and allegiances declared! Let's see who lifts the trophy on 26/05/24! It's gonna be a wild ride!
normalised: So, are you ready for another season of cricket madness? Get those snacks stocked, calendars marked, and allegiances declared! Let's see who lifts the trophy on twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty four! It's gonna be a wild ride!
